sentence.Network_cn: 他在午夜时分离开，避开了记者的追踪。

entry.def: Midnight is twelve o'clock in the middle of the night.

example.ex: It was well after midnight by the time Anne returned to her apartment...
example.tran: 安妮回到寓所的时候早就过了午夜。

example.ex: The entrance gates were locked at midnight.

entry.def: Midnight is used to describe something which happens or appears at midnight or in the middle of the night.

example.ex: It is totally out of the question to postpone the midnight deadline...
example.tran: 想要推迟午夜的最后期限是完全不可能的。

example.ex: Well we did have a midnight feast, me and my sister.
example.tran: 我和姐姐的确在半夜大吃了一顿。

entry.tran: 开夜车;挑灯夜战;工作(或读书)至深夜
entry.def: If someone is burning the midnight oil, they are staying up very late in order to study or do some other work.

example.ex: Chris is asleep after burning the midnight oil trying to finish his article.
example.tran: 克里斯为了写完文章挑灯夜战，现在已经睡着了。

means.word_mean: 1. 12 o'clock at night; the middle of the night;

sentences.sentence: "young children should not be allowed to stay up until midnight"
